casebody.data:
William PATTON III and Renee Hazleton, Individually and as Guardians Ad Litem of Liam Patton, a Minor, Plaintiffs,
v.
The CHARLOTTE-MECKLENBURG HOSPITAL AUTHORITY, Defendant. No. COA16-812 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: August 1, 2017

DISMISSED IN PART. AFFIRMED IN PART.
